src_original: dharmasya dravyādarthāntarabhūtatvāt /  arthāntaratve 'pi dharmakāraṇatve,  arthāntarasya kāryasyotpādanāt dravyasya pariṇāmaḥ itīṣṭaṃ syāt /
pūrvakānmṛtpiṇḍadravyāt kāraṇāduttarasya ghaṭadravyasya kāryasyotpattau 'mṛd dravyaṃ pariṇatam';  iti vyavahārasyopagamāt /  na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyāmanyo vikalpaḥ sambhavati,
26. na nirvivekandravyameva dharmaḥ,  nāpi dravyādarthāntaram, kiṃ tarhi?  dravyasya sanniveśo 'vasthāntaram,
